name: Untitled Battle
description:
A submission for the first CCC game jam. I have no idea what I'm doing lmfao.

Basically you're a soldier in a Roman fighting colosseum, yady yady ya. But you get switched sides every once in a while. You can choose to let a soldier die or let both of them alive until the end (There's an easter egg if you choose to do the second option ;D)

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys - Move around, duh

Left Click - Attack

Esc - Escape back to main menu (Only in battle)

Credits:

Main menu music - https://opengameart.org/content/town-theme-rpg (Author: cynicmusic)

Battle music - https://opengameart.org/content/orchestral-battle-music (Author: Zefz)

End of battle - https://opengameart.org/content/bleeding-out (Author: Brandon Morris)
